title: So much history
text: Obviously a must-do in Athens. We went in the morning before it got too crowded. Amazing views of the city.

title: Probably the best meal I've ever had
text: Authentic place, great service, extensive menu. Definitely my favorite place in Athens and ranks among my best meals ever. I still think about the pastrami....

title: Great Museum with changing exhibits
text: Museum covers at least 6,000 years of art & culture from across Asia. Great if you are in Civic Center/ Downtown
